Card 3: The Past
Knight of Swords in shadow (reversed)

Knight of Swords in shadow (reversed)
 
The Past - This position gives an insight into past occurrences 
and their contribution to the contemporary situation. It offers 
clues about the past influencers that steered the present 
conditions.
 
# Knight of Swords in shadow: The aim or ideal of the matter is 
regarding being suspicious of distorting evidence 
 
*****************************************************************
